overview:
Bridal Expressions is the source for wedding dresses and prom dresses. Located in Sandy, Utah (just 10 minutes south of Salt Lake City), Bridal Expressions is a must see for the bride who wants a designer wedding dress.

Contemporary styling and unmatched quality are the priorities of our bridal store. Our goal is to help you find your perfect wedding dress. Our expert in-store seamstress, huge selection, and unsurpassed customer service will make your experience at Bridal Expressions unforgettable.
